prompt: Can a new hire be a house of 1? (If he needs no training, or can train individually)
Is individual training required for new hires in a house of 1?
completion: No, if the new hire needs no training or can train independently.

prompt: If a new hire requires training, can they still be a part of a house of 1?
completion: Yes, as long as their training can be completed independently or without disrupting the workflow of the house of 1.

prompt: Can a new hire work in a house of 1 without any prior experience?
completion: Yes, as long as they can perform the duties of their role effectively without needing extensive training.

prompt: Do new hires in a house of 1 need to be able to work independently?
completion: Yes, in most cases, as the nature of a house of 1 often requires individual responsibility and self-motivation.
